item.title: The standard of good codebases
item.description: As software engineers, itâ€™s no surprise that we often find ourselves in a conversation talking about working on a bad codebase or seldomly a good one. But what makes a good codebase exactly? I will summarise my opinion here and please comment below if you have different thoughts.
